name: Loot Goblins
description:
Step into the world of Loot Goblins, where excess reigns supreme. But beware, for your riches attract the envy of fellow goblins eager to snatch them away. They'll employ all manner of implements, from conventional weaponry like arrows and blades to unconventional choices such as skillets and rubber fowls. And let's not overlook the goblins' penchant for... gaseous surprises. You never know when a noxious emission will launch you into the air.

In this straightforward yet entertaining game, the objective is clear: seize everything in sight and engage in spirited battles with rival goblins.

Are you prepared? Let the looting commence!
